name: proverbs of hell (DEMO)
description:
🫀Warning!🫀
  • Blood is integral to the plot
  • (Human) death, suicide, bodily harm
  • Unreality
  • Drugs, alcohol
  • Emetophobia

💉

You’re Lithium--phlebotomist, amnesiac, and zombie. Your whole un-life revolves around your job at GNCO, the company behind "Blood+": enhanced blood that gives its users superpowers. What people do with them is none of your business--or so you thought. A medical misadventure and a mysterious mailwoman rip you away from GNCO and sends you on a hunt for its mythical founder, Glorious Chairman. You can barely remember where you put your arms; how will you survive the Wastes outside the city?

Except sometimes you’re Shan, the exiled son from the all-powerful Oh family. Survival is the only thing you have time for, until a chance encounter with another disgraced former-rich kid sets you on a path of vengeance. The only way to win is to destroy GNCO, your former family’s blood empire . One of their only rivals will die any day now, leaving the company more powerful than ever.  But genetics granted you an incredible power of your own: exploding spit!

💉

🩸Original assets and soundtrack

🩸 Explore two sides of a sometimes quirky, sometimes surreal dystopia

🩸Variety of sidequests and bonus content

🩸Over 100 skills to collect

🩸 Skilltree and crafting system to further customize gameplay

Streamers: The music is not under copyright.

The demo has roughly three hours of content and represents about a fifth of what will be the finished game overall. This is for beta testing, not the final release. Join our discord server.
